idea-plugin.name: Gradle Custom Plugin Navigation
idea-plugin.description: To enable to navigate to definition file of plugins you made...
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version 0.1.0 - Beta release
- Navigate to .gradle file from build.gradle(only navigation from `plugins` block is supported)
Not supported yet(will be supported in future):
- Navigation from an argument of the legacy `apply` method
- Navigation between Kotlin files(.build.kts)
